description: The password_lock_time parameter in SAP HANA specifies the number of minutes for which a user is locked after the maximum number of failed logon attempts.

queries.name: q_password_policy_password_lock_time
queries.sql: SELECT VALUE FROM M_PASSWORD_POLICY where PROPERTY = 'password_lock_time'

actions.description: It has been determined that password_lock_time parameter is less than the default recommended value 1440. Recommended/Stronger password policy is crucial in improving the security of SAP HANA.

references: SAP Note 3230381 - What are the different parameter options available to control password policy in HANA database?,https://me.sap.com/notes/3230381
